main event: Witnesses observed two unidentified flying objects, described as grayish-white in color, over Dayton, Ohio for approximately 30 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were reported to have a silent operation with no visible means of propulsion,Several reports attempted to classify the objects as conventional aircraft, but concluded they were unidentified,Witnesses estimated the objects were approximately 400 to 1,000 yards away,Observers noted that the objects changed speed and direction that exceeded known aircraft capabilities,No photographs were included in the reports pertaining to the sightings.
witness description: Civilians who reported their observations and filled out questionnaires regarding the event.
